title: SOLD: 1913 T200 Fatima - Philadelphia (NL) w/Eppa Rixey & Grover Alexander SGC 10
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1913 T200 Fatima - Philadelphia (NL) w/Eppa Rixey & Grover Alexander SGC 10
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is a 1913 T200 Fatima - Philadelphia (NL) Team w/Eppa Rixey & Grover Alexander Rookies which has been graded an SGC 10 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review enlarged scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]

posts.post_title: REDUCED: 1913 T200 Fatima - Philadelphia (NL) w/Eppa Rixey & Grover Alexander SGC 10
